Key Match Events: Christian Eriksen scored a stunning late winner to give Denmark a 2-1 victory over Sweden
Pre-Game Insights: Jon Dahl Tomasson was inducted into the Danish football Hall Of Fame ahead of kickoff
Denmark coach Kasper Hjulmand gave credit to Tomasson for his work so far with Sweden
Post-Match Reflections: A delighted Eriksen was almost happier for the assist for the opening goal than he was for scoring the winner
Denmark coach Kasper Hjulmand said they should have scored a little more and must not give Sweden chances
Miscellaneous Highlights: Denmark round off their Euro 2024 preparations with a home game against Norway on Saturday
Denmark will face Slovenia, England and Serbia in Group C at Euro 2024
Others: Christian Eriksen pulled the strings throughout the match, and his curling, dipping strike in the 86th minute gave the Danes a well-deserved win
